::Firaxis::
       He makes a face of mock sadness.  "Now is that anyway to treat a 
guest?"  He begins to all away.  "Oh, and one more thing."  He holds up one 
finger as he turns around.  "Not all of us are here to destroy things.  Some 
of us appreciate the sanctity of life.  There are probably even some who 
would be willing to help you.  You'd do well to remember that."  He turns and 
walks back to his ship to wait for a while and watch.

--part1_17f.6669a3e.29e34ec5_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
